project.teaser: European Union Contest for Young Scientists (EUCYS) has been organised since 1989 with the aim of promoting science and research among Europe's youth and bringing together the talented young people across Europe. This contest have also brought young researchers in their very...
project.objective: European Union Contest for Young Scientists (EUCYS) has been organised since 1989 with the aim of promoting science and research among Europe's youth and bringing together the talented young people across Europe. This contest have also brought young researchers in their very early careers the chance to meet others with similar interests and abilities, and to be guided by some of the most prominent scientists in Europe. This way EUCYS seeks to strengthen the efforts made in each participating country to attract young people to careers in science and technology. EUCYS has been organised in countries across Europe with the aim of promoting science and research in them, and bringing research and young talents into spotlight in these countries. Spain was selected to organise the 32th edition of EUCYS taking place in 2020. It is the third time that this event is organised in Spain, after being hosted for the first time in Sevilla (1992) and for the second time in Valencia (2007). Due to the circumstanced imposed by the COVID-19 pandemic outbreak, the event is going to be postponed to 2021. Spain also has previous experience in organising the 31 editions of its National Contest for Young Scientists. The Host Organiser of EUCYS in 2020 will be the University of Salamanca, a Higher-Education academic institution with great compromise in teaching, research, and science dissemination towards the general public, and more than 800 years of history, being one of the oldest in Europe. Also, the host organiser will partner with the Spanish Ministry of Science, Innovation and Universities, which will provide support and advise in the organisation of the event. The City Government and Junta de Castilla y Len (Regional Government) will also provide support to University of Salamanca for the organization of the Contest. EUCYS brings together excellent young researchers from 40-69 countries. During 4 days the participating projects will be interviewed by Jury members and decisions about European Union Prizes, Special Prizes and Host Organization prizes will be made.

project.teaser: The project arises from a joint venture between Enair Energy SL and Lancor 2000 S Coop to develop a Cost efficient Small Wind Turbine (SWT) of 40 kW rated capacity (ECIWIND).Within the wind energy sector, the small wind power is growing: According to World Wind Energy...
project.objective: The project arises from a joint venture between Enair Energy SL and Lancor 2000 S Coop to develop a Cost efficient Small Wind Turbine (SWT) of 40 kW rated capacity (ECIWIND).Within the wind energy sector, the small wind power is growing: According to World Wind Energy Association the small wind power market is expected to increase massively, from 768 M in 2013 to 2517 M by 2020, at a CAGR of 22%.The main challenge of the small wind energy industry is to decrease its costs to push a socialisation of this renewable technology. Thus, this electricity generation will be more competitive in the energy market and independent of the subsidies. The European Commision highliths the importance of Small and Medium Enterprises (SMEs) as small energy producers and the need to empower them to take up this role. Several european SMEs such as farms (200-400 kWh/day) and small industry (200- 450 kWh/day). In the case that these end users are located in areas where annual average wind velocity is higher than 5 m/s, small wind turbines in the 10-50 kW capacity is the best option to cover their energy needs. The acquisition and commissioning costs of SWT in this capacity range rounds 4000 /kWh and have annual maintenance average costs of 1500 /year depending on the configuration, which makes unaffordable the investment without government subsidies. The price reduction on this capacity range can be approached through the elimination of costly parts of current technologies as the Gearbox, and the optimization of the cost/performance of the rest of components.Enair and Lancor have therefore identified a business opportunity for SWT technologies and have developed a first prototype of ECIWIND at 10 kW scale (free-gearbox with pitch control and permanent magnet generator SWT) that requires 50% less maintenance and decrease the price to end user installed in 40%, which entails an investment payback period <6 years without any government subsidy.
project.title: Cost effective wind turbine of 40 kW of rated capacity

article.title: Developing highly efficient small wind turbines
article.teaser: Solar panels on the roofs of farms and houses are a common sight across Europe, not so small wind turbines. But Eciwinds system, successfully tested, might prove to be the game-changer.

project.teaser: According to United Nations estimations, the world population will reach to 9,7 billion by 2050. Food, energy and water are the three critical resources that must be managed if mankind is going to thrive. With these figures, we will need a 70-100% increase of food supply to...
project.objective: According to United Nations estimations, the world population will reach to 9,7 billion by 2050. Food, energy and water are the three critical resources that must be managed if mankind is going to thrive. With these figures, we will need a 70-100% increase of food supply to maintain the current nutrition levels. Greenhouse farming is a solution to the food worldwide demands as it can increase the food production per acre up to 100% compared to open field agriculture. Although the energy consumption by agriculture made up only 2.8 % of final energy consumption in the EU-281, the global leader in greenhouse production of horticultural products, The Netherlands, has the highest energy consumption in Europe (7.2 %), clearly showing the impact of Greenhouse farming on energy sources. On top of that, the world to which we are currently heading also deserves energetic sustainable solutions to satisfy the growing rate of electrification in the extended populated areas. The global primary energy demand could increase by 50% by the middle of the century. Nowadays, buildings account for nearly 40% of the total energy consumption globally but it is estimated that potential energy savings in buildings could reach between 20% and 40% with new solutions. Solar panels enable energy savings; typically installed on the roof, they do not offer versatility for other type of application, such as windows to allow the entrance of the light inside buildings or greenhouses. Our solution, PanePowerSW is the unique transparent (up to 70%) solar panel glass that generates clean energy through PV technology and more importantly allows the light to shine through greenhouses and commercial buildings windows. Completely aligned with the EU 2020 Energy Strategy, PanePowerSW not only contributes to the energy savings in buildings up to 30%, but also in greenhouses, enabling the growing of the crop while reducing energy costs, quantified in 25% of the total operational costs.
project.title: Transparent Solar Panel Technology for Energy Autonomous Greenhouses and Glass Buildings

article.title: Abordar los desechos marinos de la fuente al mar
article.teaser: La Unin Europea (UE) quiere recuperar la salud de los ocanos para 2030, en consonancia con su compromiso de proteger y restaurar el medio marino. En este Results Pack se presentan doce proyectos financiados con fondos europeos bajo el programa Horizonte Europa que estn contribuyendo a descontaminar los ecosistemas acuticos, preparando el camino a un ocano prspero.

section.sectionBody:
Los residuos marinos pueden encontrarse tanto en las costas como en alta mar, a miles de kilmetros de la tierra, en el fondo de las fosas ocenicas ms profundas e, incluso, en las regiones polares entre el hielo marino. Los residuos marinos pueden perjudicar a la vida marina a travs de su ingesta, el riesgo de enredarse en ellos o a travs de la exposicin otros contaminantes presentes en ellos. Sin embargo, an no se conoce del todo las repercusiones de la exposicin a los residuos marinos en la salud humana.
Los residuos marinos son todos los objetos slidos de origen antrpico que acaban en el medio costero o marino. Los plsticos, incluidas las bolsas, las botellas y los aparejos de pesca desechados, constituyen la fraccin mayor, ms nociva y persistente de los residuos marinos. Cada ao, se calcula que entre 19 y 23 millones de toneladas de residuos acaban en los medios acuticos y, si no se toman medidas urgentes, se prev que esta cifra aumente hasta los 54 millones de toneladas para 2030.
Con el tiempo, los residuos plsticos se degradan y se descomponen en fragmentos ms pequeos. Los microplsticos son aquellos fragmentos con un dimetro inferior a 5 milmetros, mientras que los nanoplsticos son an ms pequeos, con un dimetro inferior a una milsima de milmetro.
Los microplsticos y nanoplsticos constituyen una amenaza mundial para el medio ambiente y la salud humana. Aunque an no se conocen del todo sus repercusiones, los microplsticos y los nanoplsticos, as como los aditivos que contienen y los contaminantes que se adsorben por estas partculas, afectan a los organismos y ecosistemas marinos. Por lo tanto, se requieren estrategias y herramientas innovadoras para afrontar este problema.
El objetivo de la https://research-and-innovation.ec.europa.eu/funding/funding-opportunities/funding-programmes-and-open-calls/horizon-europe/eu-missions-horizon-europe/restore-our-ocean-and-waters_es (Misin de la UE: Restaurar nuestro ocano y nuestras aguas de aqu a 2030) es reducir los residuos plsticos en el mar en al menos un 50% y disminuir en un 30% los microplsticos liberados al medio ambiente, en consonancia con el https://eur-lex.europa.eu/legal-content/ES/TXT/?uri=CELEX:52021DC0400 (Plan de accin contaminacin cero de la UE). Mediante el desarrollo, la demostracin y el despliegue de tecnologas innovadoras, esta misin contribuir a prevenir y eliminar la contaminacin y a proteger y restaurar los ecosistemas acuticos y su biodiversidad.
Adems, la https://environment.ec.europa.eu/strategy/biodiversity-strategy-2030_es (Estrategia de la Unin sobre la Biodiversidad hasta 2030), que forma parte fundamental del Pacto Verde Europeo, tiene como objetivo restablecer la salud de los ocanos. El objetivo es proteger el 30% de los mares de la UE de aqu a 2030, incluido el 10% bajo proteccin estricta.
Para hacer frente a estos retos, diferentes equipos de investigadores financiados con fondos europeos estudian el transporte de los plsticos al ocano, alternativas biodegradables sostenibles para los envases de plstico, mejorar de la gestin de residuos y aguas residuales y mejores mtodos de reciclado.

En este Results Pack de CORDIS se presentan doce proyectos de investigacin financiados con fondos europeos bajo el programa marco Horizonte Europa. Todos ellos estn contribuyendo a reducir el efecto de los residuos marinos mediante la prevencin, eliminacin, mitigacin y vigilancia, desde la fuente al mar.
En l se demuestra el potencial de explotacin, ampliacin, reproduccin y asimilacin de los proyectos por las distintas partes interesadas responsables de la aplicacin de medidas para reducir la contaminacin a escala local y regional. Los resultados de estos proyectos ayudarn a lograr el objetivo de la UE de reducir la contaminacin por plsticos a niveles que ya no sean perjudiciales para la salud y los ecosistemas naturales, respetando los lmites dentro de los cuales el planeta puede resistir, creando as un medio ambiente sin sustancias txicas.

section.sectionTitle: La investigacin de la UE muestra el camino
section.sectionBody:
En los proyectos https://cordis.europa.eu/project/id/449181/es (LimnoPlast) y https://cordis.europa.eu/project/id/449183/es (PlasticPiratesEU) sus equipos colaboraron con jvenes y ciudadanos para recopilar datos sobre la contaminacin por plsticos en ros y costas de toda Europa, para as evitar que llegue al ocano.
En https://cordis.europa.eu/project/id/449178/es (EUROqCHARM) se validaron mtodos y materiales de referencia y se armonizaron protocolos para vigilar y combatir la contaminacin por plsticos. En https://cordis.europa.eu/project/id/449182/es (MONPLAS) se form a investigadores noveles en el desarrollo de tecnologas para detectar microplsticos y determinar su repercusin en la salud humana y el medio ambiente.
En el proyecto https://cordis.europa.eu/project/id/449176/es (B4PNow) se desarroll materiales totalmente biodegradables en agua como alternativa al plstico en aplicaciones domsticas.
En https://cordis.europa.eu/project/id/449177/es (EcoFLEXY) se dise un biomaterial totalmente compostable para envases hechos con celulosa producida por bacterias, que a la larga podra sustituir al plstico.
En https://cordis.europa.eu/project/id/449185/es (VORTEX) se identificaron microorganismos especficos capaces de degradar distintos tipos de plstico. En el proyecto https://cordis.europa.eu/project/id/449180/es (LEON-T) se modelizaron la dispersin y el destino medioambiental de las fuentes de emisin de microplsticos de los neumticos y se desarrollaron nuevos neumticos para reducir las emisiones.
En https://cordis.europa.eu/project/id/449179/es (Glaukos) y https://cordis.europa.eu/project/id/449184/es (SEALIVE) se crearon nuevos materiales biodegradables y compostables, con tasas de biodegradacin ms rpidas, para su uso en redes de pesca, cajas y ropa.
Por ltimo, en https://cordis.europa.eu/project/id/445674/es (In-No-Plastic) se crearon herramientas de limpieza para eliminar plsticos del medio marino y las aguas industriales, mientras que en https://cordis.europa.eu/project/id/445678/es (SeaClear) se desarrollaron robots autnomos para la recogida de basura submarina.

article.basedOn: Basado en informacin de los proyectos
article.keywords: contaminacin por plsticos de los ocanos, residuos marinos, ecosistemas acuticos, microplsticos, nanoplsticos, biodiversidad, vigilancia ocenica

category.title: Agenda digital
category.description: Este rastreador supervisa la contribucin financiera de Horizonte Europa al desarrollo de las tecnologas digitales y la digitalizacin de la economa y la sociedad (lo que se conoce como transicin digital).

category.title: Aire puro
category.description: Este rastreador supervisa la contribucin financiera de Horizonte Europa a la poltica de aire puro (Directiva sobre techos nacionales de emisin) destinada a mejorar la calidad del aire ambiente y controlar la contaminacin atmosfrica, con el fin de proteger el medio ambiente y la salud humana.

category.title: Inteligencia artificial
category.description: Este rastreador supervisa la contribucin financiera de Horizonte Europa al desarrollo y despliegue de tecnologas y soluciones basadas en la IA. Se incluyen los proyectos en los que desarrollan herramientas de IA como parte de su mtodo de investigacin

category.title: Accin por el clima
category.description: Este rastreador supervisa la contribucin financiera de Horizonte Europa tanto a la mitigacin del cambio climtico (por ejemplo, las contribuciones a la reduccin de las emisiones de gases de efecto invernadero) como a la adaptacin al cambio climtico mediante el aumento de la resiliencia (por ejemplo, en relacin con las inundaciones, las sequas, la ordenacin territorial y la mejora de la gobernanza, la adaptacin al cambio climtico en las cadenas de valor, etc.).

category.title: Biodiversidad
category.description: Este rastreador supervisa la contribucin financiera de Horizonte Europa a la senda de recuperacin de la biodiversidad europea, incluida la proteccin de las especies, la conservacin de los ecosistemas y la rehabilitacin de los hbitats, todos ellos esenciales para la resiliencia en la adaptacin climtica y para abordar los servicios ecosistmicos, pero tambin los delitos medioambientales y la relacin entre la salud y el medio ambiente.

category.title: Agenda digital
category.description: Este rastreador supervisa la contribucin financiera de Horizonte Europa al desarrollo de las tecnologas digitales y la digitalizacin de la economa y la sociedad (lo que se conoce como transicin digital).

category.title: Aire puro
category.description: Este rastreador supervisa la contribucin financiera de Horizonte Europa a la poltica de aire puro (Directiva sobre techos nacionales de emisin) destinada a mejorar la calidad del aire ambiente y controlar la contaminacin atmosfrica, con el fin de proteger el medio ambiente y la salud humana.

category.title: Inteligencia artificial
category.description: Este rastreador supervisa la contribucin financiera de Horizonte Europa al desarrollo y despliegue de tecnologas y soluciones basadas en la IA. Se incluyen los proyectos en los que desarrollan herramientas de IA como parte de su mtodo de investigacin

category.title: Accin por el clima
category.description: Este rastreador supervisa la contribucin financiera de Horizonte Europa tanto a la mitigacin del cambio climtico (por ejemplo, las contribuciones a la reduccin de las emisiones de gases de efecto invernadero) como a la adaptacin al cambio climtico mediante el aumento de la resiliencia (por ejemplo, en relacin con las inundaciones, las sequas, la ordenacin territorial y la mejora de la gobernanza, la adaptacin al cambio climtico en las cadenas de valor, etc.).

category.title: Biodiversidad
category.description: Este rastreador supervisa la contribucin financiera de Horizonte Europa a la senda de recuperacin de la biodiversidad europea, incluida la proteccin de las especies, la conservacin de los ecosistemas y la rehabilitacin de los hbitats, todos ellos esenciales para la resiliencia en la adaptacin climtica y para abordar los servicios ecosistmicos, pero tambin los delitos medioambientales y la relacin entre la salud y el medio ambiente.

article.title: Ahondar en la investigacin ocenica: fomentar el conocimiento de los ocanos y su gestin sostenible
article.teaser: Los ocanos cubren ms del 70% de la superficie de la Tierra y albergan casi el 80% de la biodiversidad. Proporcionan oxgeno, alimentos y empleo, sustentan a miles de millones de personas y constituyen el mayor sumidero de carbono del planeta. En este Results Pack se presenta una seleccin de trece proyectos de investigacin financiados con fondos europeos, de entre otras muchas iniciativas de investigacin en el mbito de la observacin ocenica, para mostrar su importancia en la gestin sostenible de los ocanos.

article.title: Tecnologas de limpieza masiva en ecosistemas marinos
article.teaser: La basura marina es una amenaza creciente para la biodiversidad de nuestros ocanos. Gracias a la financiacin de la Unin Europea, los centros de excelencia europeos han puesto en marcha una iniciativa multidisciplinar para contrarrestarla, la cual incluye desde acciones sociales hasta diferentes aplicaciones de alta tecnologa.

project.title: Informing and educating young people on more sustainable behaviours and choices to build a future Generation informed and interested in Bioeconomy

category.title: Digital agenda
category.description: This tracker monitors Horizon Europes financial contribution to the development of digital technologies and the digitisation of the economy and society (known as Digital transition).

category.title: Clean air
category.description: This tracker monitors the Horizon Europes financial contribution to the clean air policy (National Emission Ceiling Directive) aiming to improve ambient air quality and tackle air pollution, to protect the environment and human health.

category.title: Artificial intelligence
category.description: This tracker monitors Horizon Europes financial contribution to the development and deployment of AI-based technologies and solutions. Projects that develop AI-tools as part of their research method are included

category.title: Climate action
category.description: This tracker monitors the Horizon Europes financial contribution to both mitigating climate change (e.g., contributions to the reduction of greenhouse gas emissions) and adapting to climate change by building resilience (e.g., regarding floods, droughts, spatial planning and better governance, adaptation to changing climate in value chains, etc.).

category.title: Biodiversity
category.description: This tracker monitors the Horizon Europes financial contribution to Europes biodiversitys path to recovery including species protection, ecosystem conservation, and habitat rehabilitation, all essential for resilience in climate adaptation and addressing ecosystem services but also environmental crime and the health-environment connection.

result.description: This deliverable (first version) consists on outlining a detailed planning of the dissemination and communication activities. The D5.1 is linked to Task 5.1.

project.title: Informing and educating young people on more sustainable behaviours and choices to build a future Generation informed and interested in Bioeconomy

category.title: Digital agenda
category.description: This tracker monitors Horizon Europes financial contribution to the development of digital technologies and the digitisation of the economy and society (known as Digital transition).

category.title: Clean air
category.description: This tracker monitors the Horizon Europes financial contribution to the clean air policy (National Emission Ceiling Directive) aiming to improve ambient air quality and tackle air pollution, to protect the environment and human health.

category.title: Artificial intelligence
category.description: This tracker monitors Horizon Europes financial contribution to the development and deployment of AI-based technologies and solutions. Projects that develop AI-tools as part of their research method are included

category.title: Climate action
category.description: This tracker monitors the Horizon Europes financial contribution to both mitigating climate change (e.g., contributions to the reduction of greenhouse gas emissions) and adapting to climate change by building resilience (e.g., regarding floods, droughts, spatial planning and better governance, adaptation to changing climate in value chains, etc.).

category.title: Biodiversity
category.description: This tracker monitors the Horizon Europes financial contribution to Europes biodiversitys path to recovery including species protection, ecosystem conservation, and habitat rehabilitation, all essential for resilience in climate adaptation and addressing ecosystem services but also environmental crime and the health-environment connection.

category.title: Digital agenda
category.description: This tracker monitors Horizon Europes financial contribution to the development of digital technologies and the digitisation of the economy and society (known as Digital transition).

category.title: Clean air
category.description: This tracker monitors the Horizon Europes financial contribution to the clean air policy (National Emission Ceiling Directive) aiming to improve ambient air quality and tackle air pollution, to protect the environment and human health.

category.title: Artificial intelligence
category.description: This tracker monitors Horizon Europes financial contribution to the development and deployment of AI-based technologies and solutions. Projects that develop AI-tools as part of their research method are included

category.title: Climate action
category.description: This tracker monitors the Horizon Europes financial contribution to both mitigating climate change (e.g., contributions to the reduction of greenhouse gas emissions) and adapting to climate change by building resilience (e.g., regarding floods, droughts, spatial planning and better governance, adaptation to changing climate in value chains, etc.).

category.title: Biodiversity
category.description: This tracker monitors the Horizon Europes financial contribution to Europes biodiversitys path to recovery including species protection, ecosystem conservation, and habitat rehabilitation, all essential for resilience in climate adaptation and addressing ecosystem services but also environmental crime and the health-environment connection.
